articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Bangladeshi President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Bangladeshi President 
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to Zillur Rahman, President of Bangladesh, on Friday on the occasion of the 39th anniversary of its independence.
					Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Bangladesh developing favorably day by day would grow stronger thanks to the joint efforts of both sides, Kim in the message wished the President and people of Bangladesh greater success in their work for the progress and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Greets Bangladeshi PM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Greets Bangladeshi PM
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Kim Yong Il Friday sent a message of greetings to his Bangladeshi counterpart Sheikh Hasina on the occasion of the 39th anniversary of the independence of Bangladesh.
					Expressing belief that the favorably developing relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished the Prime Minister greater success in her work for the prosperity and development of the country.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets Cote d'Ivoire FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets Cote d'Ivoire FM 
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Kacou Gervais Jean-Marie upon his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs and African Integration.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Cote d'Ivoire would grow stronger in the future, Pak Ui Chun wished him success in his new job.

articles.title: US-S. Korean Moves to Bring down System in DPRK Warned
articles.content:
US-S. Korean Moves to Bring down System in DPRK Warned
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army Thursday gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA as to the recent disclosure of new information about the desperate moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers to bring down the system in the DPRK: 
					  According to the south Korean newspaper Dong-A Ilbo dated March 19, presided over by the command of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in the Pacific, those concerned of the "Institute for National Defense Studies", the "Institute for Maritime Strategy Studies" of south Korea and the "Institute for State Policy Studies" of neighboring countries would be closeted together in the middle of April to examine the  possibility of what they called "contingency" in the DPRK and discuss a "proposal for cooperation," etc. to cope with it. It was reported that they would further their confab in Seoul in June and in Hawaii in July. 
					
					 The disclosed fact clearly indicates that the scenario to bring down the system in the DPRK already worked out by them is entering a reckless phase of implementation. 
					
					 As far as the socialist system in the DPRK is concerned, it constitutes the unshakable faith of the Korean people and it is like an impregnable fortress firmly guarded by the invincible army of Songun. 
					
					 For them to wait for what they call "contingency" to happen is a pipe dream of a lunatic wishing for the sky to fall. 
					
					 Such "contingency" will take place in south Korea where all sorts of social evils and ills and internal contradictions and conflicts have reached their height, not in the DPRK where people are bringing about epochal miracles and leap forward everyday with the day of the emergence of a thriving nation drawing near. 
					
					 It is the height of folly for the present south Korean puppet authorities to dare talk about "bringing down  system" of someone and "unifying the systems" to please their master, unaware of where they stand. 
					
					 The above-said fact once again clearly proves that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet bellicose forces have not an iota of intention to improve the relations with the DPRK but only seek to hatch plots to "bring down its system" and ignite a war.
					
					 The People's Army and people of the DPRK who always follow with high vigilance the abnormal developments in areas around the DPRK will bolster up its nuclear deterrent for self-defence capable of frustrating any plot and provocation at a single strike and keep all the powerful striking means fully ready to go into action at all times. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers should bear in mind that they will not be able to find a shelter to survive the unpredictable strikes of the KPA, should they persistently work to bring down the system in the DPRK. 
					
					 Those who seek to bring down the system in the DPRK, whether they play a main role or a passive role, will fall victim to the unprecedented nuclear strikes of the invincible army and the just war to be waged by all the infuriated service personnel and people.

articles.title: Joint Statement Issued on Centenary of Death of An Jung Gun
articles.content:
Joint Statement Issued on Centenary of Death of An Jung Gun
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The Korean Social Democratic Party and the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea issued a joint statement on March 26 on the occasion of the centenary of martyrdom of An Jung Gun. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 March 26 marks the centenary of hanging of An Jung Gun by the Japanese imperialists. 
					
					 On this day all Koreans look back on the patriotic deed of An Jung Gun, an event specially recorded in the Korean nation's history of the anti-Japanese movement, and are shaking with towering hatred for the Japanese imperialists who committed hideous crimes against it in the past. 
					
					 It is 100 years since the martyrdom of An and 65 years since the defeat of the Japanese imperialists in the war but Japan is still rushing headlong into its moves to turn itself into a military giant, seized with its wild militarist ambition, and more desperately tampering with its history, working hard to grab Tok Islets and intensifying the suppression and discrimination against the Koreans in Japan, far from redressing its past crimes. These acts on the part of Japan are only adding to its crimes committed against the Koreans. 
					
					 On the centenary of his martyrdom, the Korean Social Democratic Party and the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea state as follows on behalf of An Jung Gun and other anti-Japanese patriotic martyrs and the 70 million fellow countrymen:
					
					1. We strongly demand Japan honestly apologize for the unprecedented hideous crimes it committed against the Korean nation during its colonial rule over Korea and make full reparation for them. 
					
					 Japan had enforced the harshest-ever repressive colonial rule over Korea at the point of bayonet for more than 40 years, brutally killing at least a million innocent Koreans, forcing more than 200 000 Korean women into sexual slavery and driving over 8.4 million young and middle aged Koreans to battle fields and sites of slave labor. It, at the same time, committed such hideous crimes as vandalizing and looting lots of cultural properties and resources. But Japan has not yet made any honest apology and reparation for those hideous crimes. This only betrays Japan's political and moral vulgarity and shamelessness. If Japan truly does not want to remain a sworn enemy of the Korean people, it should make honest apology and full reparation for its crimes, though belatedly.  
					
					2. We bitterly denounce Japan's persistent moves to convert itself into a military power and its distortion of history, claim to Tok Islets and its policy of maltreating Koreans in Japan as a wanton infringement upon the sovereignty of the Korean nation.
					
					 Japan's evermore undisguised moves to turn itself into a military power, distort history and grab Tok Islets and its policy of suppression and discrimination against the Koreans in Japan reveal its foolish ambition to stage a comeback to Korea and reckless acts betraying the lack of any sense of the times. 
					
					 Japan would be well advised to clearly understand the Korean nation today and stop at once its anachronistic and chauvinist acts.
					
					3. We will never tolerate any manifestation of sycophantic and treacherous acts such as antagonizing fellow countrymen and blocking national reconciliation and unity in league with foreign forces. 
					
					 It is a bitter lesson taught by the history of the Korean nation that flunkeyism and dependence on foreign forces lead to national ruin and disgrace. Such acts as antagonizing fellow countrymen and standing in the way of national concord and unity, yielding to foreign forces, utterly indifferent to the destiny of the country and nation, are bound to be sternly judged by history. 
					
					 2010 marks the lapse of 105 years since the Japanese imperialists cooked up "the Ulsa Five-Point Treaty" by coercion, leading Korea to ruin, and 100 years since they fabricated the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" in the same manner. The above-said year also marks the lapse of 90 years since they carried out "the large punitive operation in 1920, the year of ape" and the lapse of 65 years since they blew up "Ukishima-maru," massacring innocent Koreans, and the lapse of 70 years since Japan forced the Koreans to change their names into Japanese in a bid to completely stamp out the national identity of the Koreans. 
					
					 The two parties express expectation that this year marking the year of anti-Japanese joint struggle all the Koreans in the north and the south and overseas will actively turn out in a nationwide solidarity struggle to disclose and condemn the 100-year-long history of the crimes Japan has committed against the Korean nation and force it to make apology and reparation for them.

articles.title: Independence Day of Bangladesh Marked
articles.content:
Independence Day of Bangladesh Marked
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- A meeting and a photo exhibition took place here on Friday to mark the 39th anniversary of the independence of Bangladesh.
					 Present there were the chairman and members of the DPRK-Bangladesh Friendship Association and working people in the city.
					
					 A speech was made by the chairman. Then followed the adoption of a congratulatory message to the president of Bangladesh.
					
					 At the end of the meeting its participants went round photos of the political, economic, cultural and other fields of Bangladesh.

articles.title: National Scientific and Technological Exhibition Held
articles.content:
National Scientific and Technological Exhibition Held 
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The 6th national scientific and technological exhibition in the field of machine designing took place here from March 23 to 25.
					 On display in the exhibition hall were diagrammatic charts, multimedia, etc. on more than 300 scientific and technological achievements presented by designers, researchers, technicians and teachers in the field of machine designing.
					
					 The exhibition was divided into machine design, design support program, machine type design and prize contest panels. 
					
					 Its participants had an opportunity to exchange the latest scientific and technological achievements and experience gained in working out machine designs and putting them into practice as required by IT age.
					
					 Drawing the attention of the visitors were designs of CNC-based  machine tools and production processes, designs of machines developed in Korean style and their general assembling design, successes made in developing computer databases and experience gained in updating designing means and instruments.

articles.title: Large Electronic Display Board Developed
articles.content:
Large Electronic Display Board Developed
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The State Academy of Sciences of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has of late developed a large electronic display board.
					 The flat board has pixels composed of red, blue and green-color LED. 
					
					 The development of the technology makes it possible to put integrated circuit design on a higher level.
					
					 The technology is available for slogan, scoreboard, introduction of players and live show of game in public places, gymnasiums and stadiums.
					
					 It has already been introduced in Kim Il Sung Stadium, Sports Science Library and other units after being tested successfully in different open-air conditions over the past year.

articles.title: More Books Sent to Grand People's Study House
articles.content:
More Books Sent to Grand People's Study House
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The Grand People's Study House, a grand seat for learning for all the people, has more books and data in the stacks every year.
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent there a great number of books and data again some time ago.
					
					Presented to the house last year were over 3,700 volumes in more than 2,100 categories and this year it has received more than 400 volumes in at least 170 categories.
					
					This has brought the number of books and data sent by Kim Jong Il to the house to date since last year to more than 4,100 volumes in over 2,300 categories.
					
					 Among them are books and data that are helpful to attaining broad knowledge about the four pace-setting domains of the national economy and to researches of the scientists and technicians in the fields of light industry and agriculture which are the two most important fronts in the drive for improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 They also include translated data and CDs introducing scientific and technological data in several fields as well as books and data dealing with common medical knowledge.
					
					 There are also culinary books under the titles "100 varieties of Korean foods" and "Bean curd and 682 foods made with it".
					
					 The books and data are associated with the warm solicitude of Kim Jong Il who is determined to put the national economy, science and technology and all other sectors of the country on an ultra-modern level and make the Korean people lead a highly civilized life.

articles.title: Pohyon Temple in Mt. Myohyang Tells US Crime
articles.content:
Pohyon Temple in Mt. Myohyang Tells US Crime
						
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The Pohyon Temple, a masterpiece of architecture at the beginning of the 11th century, has been preserved in Myohyang, one of the six famous mountains of Korea.
					 The temple, a cultural heritage showing the outstanding architecture and artistic workmanship of the nation, has many evidences of the barbarous atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialists during the past Fatherland Liberation War. 
					
					 Owing to the imperialists' indiscriminate bombing, more than 10 main buildings such as Taeung Hall and Manse Pavilion were destroyed and several thousand pieces of historic relics as valuable as national treasure were burnt. 
					
					 The 9-storeyed square pagoda in front of the Manse Pavilion was demolished, several-hundred-year-old trees almost burnt away and the 13-storeyed octagonal pagoda has many of its 104 copper bells broken or disappeared by bomb fragments.
					
					 The temple was restored to its original state in the 1970s.
					
					 However, scars by machine-gun bullets and fragments and cracked parts still remain in the 13-storeyed and 9-storeyed pagodas.
					
					 They serve as evidences of the crime committed by the U.S. imperialists, who have perpetrated all sorts of vicious acts, always professing themselves as envoys of "God".

articles.title: Japan's Crime in Using Koreans as Cannon Fodder
articles.content:
Japan's Crime in Using Koreans as Cannon Fodder
						
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- In the last century Japan occupied Korea by force of arms and inflicted innumerable misfortunes and pains upon the Korean people.
					 A great number of Korean people lost their lives as cannon fodder in the period of the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule.
					
					 Young Koreans aged from 17 to 20 were forcibly drafted under the pretext of "volunteers", "student soldiers" and "army civilian employees".
					
					 The Japanese imperialists drove many young and middle-aged Koreans to battle sites after establishing a "volunteer system" in the latter half of the 1930s. When they were distressed by the lack of troops along with the expansion of their aggressive war, they proclaimed a "conscription ordinance", order of the Ministry of Army No. 48, in October 1943.
					
					 They then set up a forcible "conscription" system in a short span of time to send many young and middle-aged Korean people to battle fields in a violent and deceptive way. They included even young boys in the list of "conscription".
					
					 They put all kinds of national contempt and indignity upon the draftees, made them slaves of their army and, furthermore, dispatched them to the most dangerous battle sites.
					
					 Under this system, hundreds of thousands of Korean people were killed in battle sites or victimized by the Japanese army's violence and brutal crimes.
					
					 Indeed, the "conscription" system was an enormous crime of wantonly trampling down human rights and freedom of Korean people and abusing them as victims of their aggressive war.

articles.title: US Urged to Open Its Forces' Germ Warfare in S. Korea
articles.content:
US Urged to Open Its Forces' Germ Warfare in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- Members of the Solidarity for Progress and the Democratic Labor Party in south Korea at a press conference outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on March 22 urged the U.S. to probe the truth about the germ warfare committed by the U.S. imperialists during the last Korean war.
					 Speakers at the press conference referred to the recent disclosure of information about the germ warfare carried out by the U.S. forces during the Korean war.
					
					 Noting that the U.S. use of germ weapons is a crime against humanity, they added that there are still increasing suspicions of the U.S. use of germ and chemical weapons, etc. in different parts of the world. 
					
					 They queried: "Can the continued presence of the U.S. forces in south Korea under the pretext of 'peace-keeping' be justified as they committed such hideous crimes against humanity?"
					
					 They urged the U.S. to open to the public the truth about the above-said crime, punish those responsible for it, make an apology and reparation for it and stop the use of germ weapons and opt for dismantling them. 
					
					 At the end of the press conference, they handed a written request demanding a probe into the truth about the germ warfare to the U.S. embassy.

articles.title: US Urged to Roll Back Anti-DPRK Policy in S. Korea
articles.content:
US Urged to Roll Back Anti-DPRK Policy in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of south Korea including the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration held the 253rd anti-U.S., anti-war Friday rally for the pullback of the U.S. forces in Seoul on March 19.
					 Speakers said at the rally that the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers are getting evermore desperate in the large-scale joint military exercises against the north.
					
					 Such acts of the U.S. warmongers are aimed to seize military hegemony in Northeast Asia, they said, urging the U.S. overheated with the war moves to pull its forces out of south Korea at once. 
					
					 A resolution read out at the rally accused the U.S. of bringing the dark clouds of a war to hang over this land through war exercises, not lending an ear to the voices of the international community urging the conclusion of a peace treaty on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It demanded the U.S. drop its hostile policy toward the DPRK and opt to have a dialogue for peace as early as possible.

articles.title: S. Korean Progressive Forces' Struggle Supported
articles.content:
S. Korean Progressive Forces' Struggle Supported
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- Progressive university professors and members of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea recently called for achieving solidarity and alliance to get progressive figures elected to "local self-governing bodies" in June. In response to this call, the opposition parties and civic organizations held a solidarity meeting to discuss a specific plan for unifying the candidacy.
					 Minju Joson Friday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: 
					
					 The progressive forces of south Korea can surely beat the conservative group if they go united. The solidarity sought by the opposition parties and civic organizations in the run-up to the "election to local self-governing bodies" reflects the mindset of the people who wish to see the misrule of the conservative group terminated as quickly as possible. 
					
					 They are pushing forward the process of unifying the candidacy on the basis of the lesson drawn from history and this is in line with the urgent requirement of the prevailing situation.
					
					 The conservative group is now busy staging charades to create the impression that it had done something since its coming to power in a bid to divert elsewhere the people's criticism of it and garner their support. It is leaving no means untried to win a victory in the above-said election by intensifying the fascist crackdown upon the progressive forces.
					
					 The progressive forces will go united and finally succeed in unifying the candidacy and thus mete out a stern judgment to the conservative group through the election for having enforced a treacherous, anti-reunification and unpopular misrule.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Assailed for Blocking Inter-Korean Cooperation
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Assailed for Blocking Inter-Korean Cooperation
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Federation of University Student Councils issued a statement on March 22 slamming the puppet authorities for obstructing the resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang and the area of Kaesong and standing in the way of the inter-Korean cooperation.
					 The statement deplored that the issue has not yet been properly solved due to the unreasonable attitude taken by the "government" despite the north's sincere efforts for the resumption of the above-said tour.
					
					 Mt. Kumgang is not only a tourist destination but also a place for achieving reunification, it said, adding: The resumption of the tour is a task to be fulfilled by all Koreans.
					
					 All the people should properly understand that the "government" is to blame for the failure to resume the tour as it has stood in the way of the inter-Korean cooperation and exchange, it urged. 
					
					 The People for Achieving Reunification held a meeting on Mar. 21 at which it announced a working plan for seeking the earliest possible solution to the issue of resuming the tour of Mt. Kumgang now in the grip of a serious crisis due to the moves of the puppet authorities against the nation.

articles.title: Day of Sun Commemorated in S. Africa and Guinea
articles.content:
Day of Sun Commemorated in S. Africa and Guinea
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- Lectures and a film show were held in South Africa and Guinea on Mar. 18 and 19 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 Eddie Kekana, chairman of the Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa, at the lecture said that President Kim Il Sung indicated the path of the Korean revolution with his gifted wisdom and original ideas and theories and accomplished the historic cause of national liberation. He successfully realized the cause of founding the party, the state and the army and led to victory the Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialists, the chairman said, adding: 
					
					 Kim Il Sung turned the DPRK into a powerful state in which the principle of independence in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliance in national defence is thoroughly embodied and consolidated as firm as a rock the independent people's power which commands the unanimous support from all the Korean people. 
					
					 Banou Keita, chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, at the lecture said that Kim Il Sung performed ideological and theoretical exploits to be specially recorded in the human history of thinking, adding: 
					
					 The Korean revolution could make steady victorious progress despite unprecedented arduous and complicated trials and the progressives could have a powerful ideological and theoretical weapon for national liberation and anti-imperialist struggle thanks to the creation of the Juche idea, the Songun idea by Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Kim Il Sung moved and attracted all people with his boundless loving care and benevolence. Believe in the people and rely on them at all times and you shall always emerge victorious; if you are forsaken by them, you will always fail. This is his lifelong maxim.
					
					 Appreciated at the film show was a Korean film "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation."

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Commemorated by Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Commemorated by Koreans in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in the Far East of Russia and the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia jointly formed a preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun on March 16.
					 Kwon Chon Sik, chairman of the confederation, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the inaugural ceremony. 
					
					 The committee set the days from March 16 to April 18 as the period of commemoration and decided to hold colorful functions including a meeting to adopt a message of greetings and a commemoration meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre el terreno las fabricas mecanicas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre el terreno las fabricas mecanicas  
Pyongyang, 26 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC) y el Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Maquinas Electricas de Chonma y la Fabrica de Maquinas de Taehungsan donde se despliegan energicamente las campanas para conquistar las tecnicas de punta.
					  Primeramente, el Dirigente estuvo en la Fabrica de Maquinas Electricas de Chonma.
					
					  Tras escuchar las explicaciones sobre la modernizacion de la fabrica recorrio los procesos productivos en varias horas enterandose detalladamente del estado de reconstruccion tecnica y de produccion.
					
					  Expreso una gran satisfaccion de que los obreros de la fabrica lograron un desarrollo deslumbrante en la produccion de las maquinas electricas realizando excelentemente la modernizacion y la cientifizacion de los procesos productivos como la introduccion de la tecnologia CNC y evaluo altamente sus exitos orgullosos.
					
					  Al ver las maquinas y los equipos transformados tecnicamente y varios productos con alta precision dijo que los obreros de la planta, al desplegar inteligencia creadora y fortalecer la cooperacion, lograron un cambio asombroso en la produccion solucionando con sus propias fuerzas y tecnicas muchos problemas cientificos y tecnicos.
					
					  Y elogio altamente el fervor de lucha de ellos quienes despliegan la lucha energica para conquistar las tecnicas de punta con la extraordinaria determinacion de exaltar nuestra patria al mundo mediante la competencia cerebral y tecnica.
					
					  Senalo que la orgullosa realidad de la fabrica demuestra que al movilizar el fuerte poderio espiritual, la inagotable facultad creadora y la firme potencialidad tecnico-economica de la nacion      Kim Il Sung podran conquistar cualquier baluarte de punta.
					
					  La epoca de la economia intelectual que progresa con rapidez basandose en el desarrollo universal de las ciencias y tecnicas, la gran cantidad de conocimientos acumulados y el uso activo de estos demuestra que el forjador de la lucha para conquistar las tecnicas de punta sera el conquistador y triunfador del futuro, subrayo y enfatizo en la necesidad de desplegar incesantemente la lucha por conquistar las tecnologias de punta en todos los dominios.
					
					  Al ver varios articulos de primera necesidad para el uso diario producidos en la fabrica utilizando con eficacia las materias residuales califico altamente de su calidad y elogio el espiritu de servicio al pueblo de los productores quienes se esfuerzan infatigablemente por la mejora de la vida popular.
					
					  Al mirar el recinto cubierto de varios arboles frondosos evaluo como el exito orgulloso el que fue asegurada en el alto nivel la cultura en la produccion y la vida al arreglar mejor como palacio el interior de la fabrica y como parque su exterior, y puntualizo que esto deviene un precioso resultado del amor de los obreros a la fabrica y la patria.
					
					  El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que  le incumben a la fabrica.
					
					  El Dirigente Kim Jong Il dirigio sobre el  terreno la Fabrica de Maquinas de Taehungsan.
					
					  Mientras que recorre varios talleres y productos de la fabrica se entero detalladamente del estado de la reconstruccion tecnica y de produccion.
					
					  Tras ver diversas maquinas operadas por la tecnologia CNC y los productos mecanicos de buena calidad que estan repletos en los talleres se mostro muy satisfecho de que gracias a la investigacion y el desarrollo de las tecnicas de punta fue logrado un desarrollo vertiginoso en la produccion.
					
					  Evaluo altamente los meritos de los obreros de la fabrica expresando gran alegria de que estos realizaron con sus propias fuerzas y tecnicas la modernizacion de la fabrica desplegando plenamente el espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza y desempenan el papel vanguardista en la lucha por  conquistar las tecnicas de punta y.
					
					  Al recorrer el deposito de soya y otros establecimientos de intendencia, se entero del trabajo del servicio de abastecimiento y evaluo los esfuerzos de los funcionarios de ahi quienes acondicionaron su fabrica como modelo de la labor de servicio de abastecimiento.
					
					  Y presento las tareas programaticas ante la fabrica.
					
					  En esta ocasion el Dirigente Kim Jong Il fue acompanado por Kim Phyong Hae, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek, jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, y Ri Jae Il, primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Vocero de EMG del EPC advierte a los belicistas yanquis y surcoreanos
articles.content:
Vocero de EMG del EPC advierte a los belicistas yanquis y surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 26 de marzo (ATCC) -- El vocero del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea respondio el dia 25 a la pregunta formulada por un reportero de la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea en relacion con que fue publicado nuevo dato de que recientemente los belicistas yanquis y los titeres surcoreanos recurren con frenesi a las maquinaciones para derrocar el regimen de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					La respuesta dice como sigue:
					
					Segun el periodico surcoreano Dong-A Ilbo fechado 19, bajo el mando de la Comandancia de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas en la region del Pacifico, los interesados del "Instituto de Defensa Nacional" y el "Instituto de Estrategia Maritima" del Sur de Corea y del "organo de estudio de la politica nacional" de paises vecinos debatieron los "proyectos de cooperacion" para diagnosticar la posibilidad de surgimiento del "estado bruscamente cambiado" de la RPDC y hacer frente a eso y acordaron continuar tales conciliabulos en Seul y Hawai, EE.UU., respectivamente, en  junio y julio.
					
					Tal hecho demuestra que el plan de derrocamiento del regimen de la RPDC, planteado ya por los belicistas norteamericanos y los titeres surcoreanos, pasa a la practica imprudente.
					
					El sistema socialista de la RPDC es la firme confianza arraigada en el corazon de las masas populares y un baluarte inexpugnable que se defiende por las invencibles fuerzas armadas del Songun.
					
					Esperar el "estado bruscamente cambiado" en tal pais es la vana ilusion de un loco que quiere caer el cielo. 
					
					La llamada "contingencia" no sucedera en la RPDC que crea diariamente los milagros y saltos del siglo acercandose a la gran potencia prospera, sino en el suelo surcoreano donde llegan al extremo los males sociales de toda indole, los vicios epidemicos, las contradicciones internas y los conflictos.
					
					Es muy ridiculo que las autoridades titeres surcoreanas se atrevan, lisonjeando a su amo norteamericano sin darse cuenta de su situacion, a hablar del "derrocamiento del sistema" de alguien y de la "reunificacion institucional".
					
					Se ha evidenciado una vez mas que los imperialistas estadounidenses y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos no tienen ni la minima voluntad de mejorar las relaciones con la RPDC, sino trazan la artimana para "derrocar el sistema" de esta con la ambicion de provocar la guerra. 
					
					  Nuestro ejercito y pueblo, que observan siempre con agudo la situacion anormal de las regiones de  contorno, consolidaran mas el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa capaz de frustrar de un golpe cualesquier artimanas y provocaciones y mantendran en estado de alerta permanente todos los poderosos medios de ataque. 
					
					  Los imperialistas estadounidenses y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos deben tener presente que si siguen recurriendo a las imprudentes maniobras encaminadas a derrocar el sistema de la RPDC, no podran encontrar nunca el nido de vida ante el golpe imprevisible de la RPDC.
					
					  Los que persiguen el derrocamiento del sistema de la RPDC, aunque sean promotores o no, sufriran por el verdadero golpe nuclear del poderoso ejercito sin rival nunca visto en la historia y por la verdadera guerra que declaren los miles y miles de militares y civiles enojados.

articles.title: Desarrolladas muestras electronicas de gran tamano
articles.content:
Desarrolladas muestras electronicas de gran tamano 
						
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ATCC) -- La Academia Estatal de Ciencias de Corea acabo de desarrollar muestras electronicas de gran tamano, cuyos pixeles estan compuestos de LED (diodo emisor de luz) de colores rojo, azul y verde. 
					El desarrollo de estas muestras posibilita elevar a una etapa mas alta la tecnologia de disenos de circuito integrado del pais.
					
					Ademas, se ha preparado una base cientifico-tecnica para instalar sin restriccion alguna en la rama de informatica y en la de propaganda y agitacion las grandes pantallas electronicas de varias formas para mostrar las consignas, anunciar las marcas deportivas, introducir a los jugadores y mostrar en tiempo real las imagenes moviles en los lugares publicos, los gimnasios, los estadios, etc. 
					
					Ya se han introducido en varias unidades como el Estadio Kim Il Sung y la Biblioteca de la Ciencia Deportiva los tableros electronicos de consignas, las pantallas electronicas de marcas deportivas y las de imagenes moviles en tiempo real. 
					
					Las dos pantallas mencionadas ya confirmaron su capacidad en el ano pasado en distintas condiciones y circunstancias al aire libre.

articles.title: VI exposicion nacional cientifico-tecnica de rama de diseno mecanico
articles.content:
VI exposicion nacional cientifico-tecnica de rama de diseno mecanico
Pyongyang, 26 de marzo (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar del dia 23 al 25 en esta capital la VI Exposicion Nacional de Ciencias y Tecnicas de la Rama de Diseno Mecanico.
					En la ocasion fueron exhibidos en forma de esquemas y multimedias mas de 300 exitos cientifico-tecnicos presentados por los disenadores, investigadores, tecnicos y profesores de esta rama.
					
					En la presente exposicion efectuada en las secciones de diseno mecanico, programa de diseno, proyecto de tipos de maquinas y concurso, fueron intercambiados los exitos cientificos y tecnicos de punta y las experiencias logrados en el diseno de los productos mecanicos convenientes a la demanda de la epoca IT y en su realizacion.
					
					Llamaron  atencion de los participantes el diseno de maquina herramienta CNC y procesos de su produccion, el proyecto de productos mecanicos desarrollados al estilo coreano y el plano de su montaje general, los exitos logrados en el desarrollo de los archivos de computacion y las experiencias logradas en la modernizacion de los medios y aparatos de diseno.
